definition: to change/to become different/to transform/to vary/rebellion

sentences.english: It is easy to use and its performance is better than cast iron frequency-sensitive rheostat.
sentences.chinese: 經濟實用，便於推廣，且性能優於鑄鐵片頻敏變阻器。

sentences.english: A new kind of stepping integrated electronic rheostat is put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種新型的步進式集成電子變阻器。

sentences.english: The novel features of the invention is a varistor that is connected in parallel with the capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 本發明的新穎特點在於有一併聯在電容上的變阻器。

sentences.english: If the resistance wire is burnt out, change another field rheostat.
sentences.chinese: 如電阻絲燒斷，應更換磁場變阻器。

sentences.english: A variable resister is called a rheostat.
sentences.chinese: 可以調節的電阻器叫做變阻器。

sentences.english: Adjust the rheostat to the pipe nipple position.
sentences.chinese: 把磁場變阻器調節至短接位置。

sentences.english: A variable resister is called a rheostat .
sentences.chinese: 可以調節的電阻器叫做變阻器。

sentences.english: Circuit 12, slide rheostat and the use of electrical appliances in the circuit in parallel.
sentences.chinese: 電路12，滑動變阻器和用電器並聯在電路中。

sentences.english: A spiral rheostat which is very high in resolution capacity is designed.
sentences.chinese: 本文設計出了一個調節分辨率極高的螺旋調節變阻器。

sentences.english: You can change the rheostat value by dragging its wiper.
sentences.chinese: 拖動變阻器觸片可以改變其阻值。

sentences.english: The varistor and the resistor are mounted externally.
sentences.chinese: 變阻器和電阻器安裝在外面。
